directions: In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.  Add mushrooms, onions, and garlic; saute until  tender. Add chicken, and cook until no longer pink. Stir in pasta sauce, wine, and brown  sugar. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add drained and sliced roasted red peppers, and simmer 5 minutes more.
Meanwhile, cook pasta according to package directions.  Drain. Serve sauce over pasta.
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 (14 ounce) jar roasted Italian cherry peppers, drained and chopped
title: Quick Chicken Zingarella
